level.text: An owner or occupant may file a petition for an administrative, hearing to review the decision of the General Manager within fifteen (15) calendar days.
A petition for administrative hearing shall be made in writing within fifteen (15) calendar days of the date of the notice specified by ยง 409.1 of this chapter.
